titles.title: Sacramento RIVER Act of 2024
Sacramento River Improvement and Vitality for Ecosystem Restoration Act of 2024
Sacramento RIVER Act of 2024
Sacramento River Improvement and Vitality for Ecosystem Restoration Act of 2024
Sacramento RIVER Act of 2024
A bill to establish the Integrated Water Management Federal Leadership Committee, to provide for improved drought resilience and dam safety, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Manchin without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 641.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
